items.name: CHIPS, GUAC & SALSA
items.description: Sliced pears, spinach, spring mix, red onion, dried cranberry, goat cheese & brown sugar bourbon

items.name: DEVILED EGGS
items.description: Think picnic!, Eggs filled with a whipped mixture of mustard, mayo, dill & cayenne, topped with bacon and a sliver of chive.

items.name: MUCHO NACHO
items.description: Well, we donâ€™t make the chips, but we do everything else! Chips covered with a bed of homemade chili, lettuce, cheese and peppers.

items.name: OH MY GOSH PRETZELS
items.description: These have got to be the best pretzels in town. Made specially for us by local Tuba Baking using a 200 year old German recipe. 6 individual pretzel balls served with Northern Rowâ€™s house made beer cheese and stone ground mustard!

items.name: CUP OF CHILI
items.description: Cincinnati is the mecca of chili, so here is our tribute to the hard working steam table chefs of the city.

items.name: BLT SALAD
items.description: Bacon, quartered tomatoes, shredded cheddar, and ranch tossed with our house greens.

items.name: A BEET SALAD
items.description: Sliced golden beets, spinach, spring mix, red onion, dried cranberry, goat cheese & brown sugar bourbon walnuts. Served with a side of sweet balsamic.

items.name: CHICKEN SALAD
items.description: Northern Row chicken salad served on a bed of fresh lettuce with cranberry's, diced celery, red pepper, and red onion.

items.name: CHICKEN SALAD SANDWICH
items.description: Chicken breast, celery, red onion, dried cranberry, Northern Row mayo-sweet vinegar dressing, served on a warm Emâ€™s sourdough bun with choice of side.

items.name: BEEF & CHEDDAR SLIDERS
items.description: Shaved Allen Brothers roast beef, stout-caramelized onions, tangy cabbage slaw and house beer cheese served on slider buns specifically made for us by our friends at Emâ€™s Bakery. Served with side of hot slaw.

items.name: KEITHâ€™S TURKEY REUBEN
items.description: We started with Pickled Pig caraway kraut and built this classic sandwich from there. Oven-roasted turkey, swiss, applewood bacon and house-made Thousand Island dressing, served on Allez Bakery rye with a choice of a side.

items.name: DAVEâ€™S â€œREAL REUBENâ€
items.description: â€œThe squeaky wheel gets the Reubenâ€ Hope this keeps the olde guy happy! He likes to constantly remind us that a real reuben samich has Pastrami and a side. Made with amazing Allen Brothers pastrami.

items.name: NOW THATâ€™S A HAM & CHEESE
items.description: Shaved Nueskie ham, melted Swiss, house made sweet pickles, classic yellow mustard, piled on an Emâ€™s bun. What could be better?

items.name: 5 STORY'S CLUB
items.description: We cut an Emâ€™s Bun like a Big Mac then built this marvel. Ham & Swiss on the bottom, and a Turkey, Roast Beef, bacon, lettuce, and Northern Row Peppery Mustard Mayo on top. This beast is worthy of a story! Comes with a side.

items.name: SHREDDED BEEF SANDWICH
items.description: Slow cooked beef, seasoned and pulled and served with horseradish sauce between a potato bun. Comes with choice of side.

items.name: 7 LAYER DIP
items.description: Big enough to share: seven layers of refried beans, house-made chili, sour cream, shredded lettuce, shredded cheese, salsa and guacamole, surrounded by chips. Serves 4.

items.name: PASTA POT PIE
items.description: Rotini noodles covered with our Chicken Pot Pie mix. This employee favorite has been voted our grab and go to food item.

items.name: STUFFED ACORN SQUASH
items.description: Tender roasted acorn squash, stuffed with rice, green onion, garlic, cranberry, & parlsey salad. Topped with grated parmesan & pepitas.

items.name: CHILI MAC
items.description: Outcast Gargantuan twist on a hometown favorite. We promise you wonâ€™t leave hungry!

items.name: HUSTLER's MAC & BEER CHEESE
items.description: A classic comfort dish. House made using our own Hustler beer cheese. Elbow noodles, Gruyere cheese topped with Grippoâ€™s barbecue crumbles.

items.name: FAUX CHICKEN POT PIE
items.description: Tender shredded chicken breast, house-made gravy with vegetables. Topped with a buttery crust.

items.name: DISTILLERY PASTA SALAD
items.description: Bowtie pasta, broccoli, red onion, red bell peppers, distillery- slaw dressing.

items.name: WEASELâ€™S POPCORN
items.description: We avoided the obvious pun because Francois the beer weasel takes his popcorn seriously.

items.name: WEST SIDE HOT SLAW
items.description: Cross Vine Street and try this treat from our West Sideâ€™s German heritage! Name says it all.

items.name: BREWERY POTATO SALAD
items.description: Russet potatoes, celery, green onion, boiled egg, mustard, brewery-blended mayo-honey dressing.

items.name: SIDE SALAD
items.description: House greens, shredded cheddar, red onion, croutons, and a side of ranch dressing.

items.name: HOLY TOLEDO IT'S A BREAKFAST BURRITO
items.description: Veggie burrito: Scrambled eggs, salsa con queso, seasoned potatoes, bell peppers, heirloom tomatoes, black beans. Sausage burrito: scrambled eggs, salsa con queso, seasoned potatoes,bell peppers, LK Hand- made Sausage from Findlay Market.

items.name: HUSTLER
items.description: Light, crisp, traditional German lager. â€œLike brewing in a Speedo: Nothing to hide behind!â€

items.name: BARRISTER
items.description: Light, bright, refreshing and subtly sweet. We use traditional Ingredients to pay homage to a classic style out of Cologne, Germany.

items.name: DESIGNER
items.description: Traditional German wheat beer. Banana and clove esters.

items.name: BUTCHER
items.description: German amber lager, nutty, toasty and caramelly Festbier. malt character.

items.name: BREWER
items.description: German amber lager, nutty, toasty and caramelly Festbier. malt character.

items.name: FARMER
items.description: Super smooth malty IPA, highlighting locally grown fresh Hops from Boondockâ€™s Hop Farm in New Richmond, Ohio.

items.name: COBBLER
items.description: Our Drifter IPA with a fresh addition of blood orange.

items.name: DRIFTER
items.description: Our original house IPA. Rich and hoppy with a dry finish

items.name: BOOZER
items.description: Robust imperial stout aged for over a year in various bourbon barrels.

items.name: BANKER
items.description: IBUs are a little higher but the chocolate and coffee notes still shine through and itâ€™s for a good cause.

items.name: PREACHER
items.description: Your prayers have been answered, and the Preacher is back in the house! Golden ale with a fresh addition of peach and apricot puree.

items.name: POSER
items.description: Ladies and Gentlemen, Tiny Elvis is in the building!

items.name: ROBBER
items.description: A light yet flavorful wheat beer with orange peel and coriander spice bringing out citrus notes. The Robber doesnâ€™t ask whatâ€™s in the bag, he just takes it because he knows he likes it!

items.name: OUTCIDER
items.description: We had our friends at Douds Orchard in Indiana pick early harvest apples for our house cider blend. It starts with white wine notes and a beautiful green apple tart finish. This is a great non-beer option!

items.name: CARLYEâ€™S OLD FASHIONED
items.description: This post-prohibition recipe is bourbon served over a muddled sugar cube, house-infused cherry and finished with an orange zest. Served on the rocks. This is a big drink from a small Bartender with lots of personality, just like Carlye!

items.name: MOJITO
items.description: No matter how you shake it, itâ€™s our most popular cocktail. Five Stories rum, lime, mint, sugar and soda. Served on the rocks in a tall pilsner glass. Ask your server about our seasonal Preacherito!

items.name: ZOMBIE STREETCAR
items.description: This blend of whiskey, peach schnapps and cranberry juice is the perfect shot when you have nowhere to go!

items.name: HEMINGWAY DAIQUIRI
items.description: Five Stories White Rum, Grapefruit, Cherry Liqueur, Lime & Simple. We could write a book about this cocktail.

items.name: STRAWBERRY BASIL SMASH
items.description: Five Stories 7X Vodka, basil, fresh-muddled strawberries: this easy sipper is as sweet as it is refreshing!

items.name: LIL' PALOMA
items.description: This is a refreshing and sweet blend of grapefruit, Tequila and housemade simple syrup. Perfect for relaxing on the Patio!

items.name: WHISKEY SOUR
items.description: This very bourbon-forward drink is not for the faint of heart. Bourbon, house-made sour mix, and squeeze of OJ. Served on the rocks.

items.name: ESPRESSO MARTINI
items.description: Five Stories 7X Vodka, coffee liquor served chilled in our classic coupe.

items.name: COIN STYLE MARGARITA
items.description: This West Coast version of a margarita highlights the fresh squeezed juices and natural citrus flavors. Served on the rocks in a salt rimmed glass.

items.name: COS'ROW MARTINI
items.description: Five Stories Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry juice and touch of lemon served chilled in our classic coupe.

items.name: LEMON DROP MARTINI
items.description: Five Stories 7X Vodka, lemon, Served chilled in a classic coupe, finished with a sugared lemon.

items.name: GIN RICKEY
items.description: Five Stories gin, lime juice, and soda served on the rocks. Very refreshing.

items.name: MOSCOW MULE
items.description: Five Stories 7X Vodka, lime, House-made ginger syrup & topped with ginger beer. Perfect drink for relaxing in O-T-R.Five Stories 7X Vodka, lime, House-made ginger syrup & topped with ginger beer. Perfect drink for relaxing in O-T-R.

items.name: WHITE - PROTOCOLO BLANCO
items.description: Light-bodied, Spanish white wine made from two indigenous grapes (60% Macabeo, 40% AirÃ©n).

items.name: RED - PROTOCOLO TINTO
items.description: Medium-bodied, Spanish red made from the Tempranillo grape (the varietal that is used in Rioja).

items.name: AVES DEL SUR SAUVIGNON BLANC
items.description: Bright, crisp wine from Chile with citrus fruit flavors.

items.name: CARL EHRHARDT â€œBLANC DE NOIRSâ€ PINOT NOIR
items.description: An extremely unique white wine made in Germany. Actually made from Pinot Noir (a red grape) where the juice is removed from the skins immediately after pressing so as not to impart any color, this is a â€œwhite from blackâ€ grapes (Blanc de Noirs) expression.

items.name: DOMAINE DE VELANGES CHARDONNAY
items.description: A fresh, medium-bodied Chardonnay from the Burgundy region of France. Apple and stonefruit with bright acidity.

items.name: GUIGAL COTES DU RHONE BLANC
items.description: This wine hails from the Rhone region of France. Full-bodied and aromatic, it is a blend of several indigenous white grapes.

items.name: CHATEAU VIRGILE
items.description: This DRY rose with wild strawberry and red cherry aromas. Made through gentle pressing and leaving the skins in contact for a short amount of time, so as to only extract a small amount of pigment for the finished wine.

items.name: GROCHAU CELLARS â€œCOMMUTER CUVEEâ€ PINOT NOIR
items.description: Small production Pinot Noir from the famed Willamette Valley of Oregon.

items.name: AVIGNONESI CANTALORO
items.description: This â€œsuper-Tuscanâ€ is a red blend of Sangiovese (the red grape of Chianti), Cabernet Sauvignon, and Merlot.

items.name: MATTHEW FRITZ CABERNET
items.description: Classic California Cab with blackberry and spice.

items.name: BLACK SHEEP BLANC
items.description: Delivers bright citrus on the palate subtle melon flavors with crisp clean finish

items.name: BLACK SHEEP ROSEÂ´
items.description: Watermelon and raspberry notes with zesty finish. Subtile minerality.

items.name: SANGIOVESE
items.description: Medium-bodied red leads with cedar, vanilla and baking spice aroma. Good tannic balance.

items.name: MALBEC
items.description: Bright fruit aroma with subtle toasted oak. Fruity nose with black pepper and spice.

items.name: WHITE RUM
items.description: Caribbean forward rum - back blended with ex-bourbon barrel aged rum to evoke a sweet, complex & smooth finish.

items.name: COCONUT RUM
items.description: Subtle, sweet flavors take your thoughts to a beach cabana. Fresh roasted coconut with our Black-strap molasses based rum, a match made in heaven.

items.name: LONDON DRY GIN
items.description: Five Stories original take on the classic London Dry. Distilled in house and having no additional sweet- ening nor flavoring after distillation. Strong Juniper aroma and flavor with a long dry finish.

items.name: BOTANICAL GIN
items.description: Traditional botanical blend of the big seven. Highlighting the spicy notes of coriander and licorice balanced with an earthy dry finish.

items.name: WET HOP BOTANICAL GIN
items.description: This unique Gin has been distilled using fresh wet hop cones from our freinds at Boondocks Hop Farm in New Richmond Ohio. Presenting a subtile hint of the hop oils combined with light juniper and licorice.

items.name: WINTER GIN
items.description: Late fall harvested Juniper and Peppermint tea. Opens with light licorice and cinnamon spiciness, and finishes with a cool mint burst.

items.name: 7X VODKA
items.description: Grain based small batch vodka, distilled seven times for a smooth, soft and creamy mouth-feel with a clean finish.

items.name: PEPPERED VODKA
items.description: This vodka is made using 5 types of fresh peppers that are hand sliced and macerated for two weeks. We then run the wash throught the still, keeping much of the pepper flavor without all of the heat. Suprisingly smooth and perfect for a spicy cock-tail.

items.name: PEACH BRANDY
items.description: Handcrafted from Geor- gia Peaches creating a wonderful aromatic spirit that naturally brings the sweet peach to your nose with a soft creamy buttery finish.
